content.detailedDescription: I just got home from work with my young son and parked my car in front of my garage i found that my neighbor had cut some large trees in which one fell on my roof i got out of the car and was looking at the roof damage i was facing east and low in the sky i saw about 10 egg shaped very shiny objects flying counter clockwise as they were still flying one would fly out going east still shining bright until it was out of sight which took about three seconds the rest kept flying counter clockwise with the gap from the missing one and in about 10 seconds the one would fly back and fit in formation perfectly this happened several times then one would fly out and when it was out of sight another would fly out while they were still going counter clockwise then one by one they flew out going east until they were all gone i was amazed or maybe stunned i could not believe what i was seeing i kept looking at the sky and they never came back it was a bright sunny afternoon and i thought it may be shiny aircraft in an air show with the sun reflecting off them i ran in the house quick and called the airport to see if there was an air show in the area he said there was no air show and no aircraft in the area i asked him about maybe a military operation he said he did not have access to that information i never knew who else to contact about this i talked to friends and family about this they all look at me like im crazy im not this really did happen this has bothered me a lot all these years i wish there was someone i could talk to about this and maybe get some kind of answer or closure thank you
content.summary: Low in the sky i saw about 10 very shiny objects flying counter clockwise in and out of formation rapidly

content.detailedDescription: My lady friend and i just finished smoking hookah at bubblehead hookah lounge a few minutes past midnight. we walked outside the hookah lounge and was in conversation, when she said to me, "look at that big blueish green light in the sky it is just oddly hoovering there" wide open sky nothing in sight just wide large open sky. i looked up and there it was as plain as day, u.F.O just hooverind. then suddenly it went sideways extremely fast, faster then an airplane, faster then a helicopter, and definitely no ballon. well it went left extremely quick, then right extremely quick, but it moved strange like earths atmosphere and gravity effected the craft differently. then it stopped hovered for a few minutes then light speed went backwards then descent downwards a few hundred feet or so and then just dissappeared. and the whole the this big bright bluish green orb floated around it had an inner light that flashed very quickly not consistently and just about twice the whole hour it was bright blue, then red the stopped. the ord staid the exterior glow of this bluish green the whole hour even when the inner light color flashed briefly. this was definitely not a commercial airline or identified military aircraft.
content.summary: I was talking with my lady friend out side of bubblehead hookah lounge when she said look at that big bright blueish green light in the sky just hovering, her and i watched it hoover then quickly move oddly, then descend and disappear.

content.detailedDescription: After a bonfire on the edge of the woods. saw an object in the sky, looked different from the trees. could hear a humming sound like a generator. we stared at it for 10 mins then it ascended up into the sky and disappeared. terrifying.
content.summary: Hovered then zoomed away.

content.detailedDescription:
I was leaving a friends apartment who lives in a building that has an elevated community area. 6 stories up, there is a pool, hot tub, gym, social room, lots of outside tables and places to sit and enjoy the view from up that high. as i was walking outside, towards the elevator room, i simply noticed this odd floating object in the sky. at first, i thought it was a weird type of blimp, which made me stop to try and figure out what exactly kind of special blimp could it be? within seconds, i then notices that it was triangularly shaped and at each point of what would be a triangle, there were flashing white lights. the lights werent flashing quickly, more of a slow alternating pattern. the object was about the size of a large suv (yukon/suburban). then it slowly started ascending. it got so high that i walked myself to the edge of the building so i could get a better view as i watch this thing slowly disappear out of my sight. it eventually got so small, that it became the size of a very distant star. i was so shocked/blown away by this object, i strained myself to watch it as long as i possibly could, and it definitely left the atmosphere. after this object completely disappeared out of my sight, i was ready to walk away, but as my eyes fixed on the horizon (keep in mind i was 6 stories up), i spotted another object! i was completely freaking out, mainly because i was alone and i wanted someone else to be seeing what i was seeing! i wasn't scared, the objects were moving so slowly and silently and smoothly, it was almost calming. the second object i spotted was much lower than the first one i had seen. perhaps the first one was that low in the beginning, but i arrived as it began to ascend. anyway, the second object seemed to travel a slow path from west to east. it looked exactly like the first object. triangular with rounded edges. not a sharp triangle, more of a round one. if you could imagine, an "obese" triangle where the outer lines sort of bulged out and weren't exactly straight from one point of the triangle to the other points of the object. the second object was also the size of a large suv, with alternating slowly pulsating lights at the 3 "points" of the triangle. the second object was maybe 50-100 yards above where i was (height wise) (to be clear, the object was not directly above me, but the height of the object seemed to be 50-100 yards higher than me, again keep in mind i was already 6 stories above street level) then, exactly like the first object, it began to ascend. as it began to ascend, it seemed to stop moving from west to east and it seemed to just ascend straight up. slowly. like watching a balloon, only it was steady and didnt bounce around in the wind. and again, like the first one, i kept my eyes on it until it seemed to completely disappear out of sight and became so distant, i lost it in the stars. 

when i spotted the first object, there was 2 security guards that were about to patrol the 6 floor area, and i called them over quickly to observe with me. one security officer dismissed it immediately as a "drone", but i have seen drones and this object was significantly larger than a drone. also, drones dont typically have the shape that this object did and drones also dont have lights like this object did and drones definitely dont leave the atmoshpere slowly. the 2nd security guard wash as confused and in aw as i was. but after it disappeared, he went back to patrolling the inside part of the building, and it was at that point that i walked away from the elevator entry way and walked over to the edge of the building to try and continue watching the object ascend away. 

then, i noticed the second object..And for some period of time, i was alone again. i was hoping that somebody would come outside where i could call them over when i first saw the second object, because i could very clearly see- it was not a drone. i could see its size and i could see much more detail than i had a chance to see on the first object. as the second object started ascending, a group of 4 people walked out to the patio/barbeque area (where i was standing) and i immediately rushed over to them to point out what i was observing. they were blown away, and i began asking them if they had ever seen a drone, that way i could be certain that what i was seeing was not a drone, and they all agreed- it was not a drone. but by the time the group of 4 people came out and i made them aware of the object i had been watching, the object was pretty high up already and it was difficult for them to really grasp what they were looking at. to them, it would be easy to mistake the object for a distant airplane, if it werent for the 3 alternating lights that i was able to point out the objects triangular shape by the pattern of the lights. they were amazed, as i was. i only wish that someone else had been there with me when i first noticed the second object because it was so close at first. i could see great detail and i watched it as it moved silently and slowly. i am 99% sure, the 2 objects i saw were ufo's. ive never seen anything else like it in my entire life, for sure.
content.summary: Round/triangular, with 3 alternating lights, traveling from west to east slowly, then ascending slowly until completely out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: Monroe ny 1953 walking with my dog by a swamp,and lake. i looked up and saw the oval hazy object with a red hue on top ,my dog took off and ran , i yelled to my mother who also saw it from further back from our home. there was a  strange silence no sounds no birds, frogs, deadly silent, it was a oval cloudy shape hovered for about 4 minuets or more, red hazy spot on top, i knew it was a ufo,jets from stewart air force base newberg tracked it later ,i heard it on radio,  the oval object just hovered , i didnt want to take my eyes off it, while i was looking it just shifted back and forth a few times and disappeared. the silence then lifted and all was normal.  i was not scared . i told my teacher and class when school started again, all laughed at me , i never told a soul till i saw a program on tv many years later. two cops from pine ny saw exactly what i saw on patrol.  about 30 years later i had a recurrence of that silence while working on my deck (alone) up in putney vermont, it was deadly silent, i felt watched , heard voices , also felt looked at, no bird sounds , no outside sounds nothing!  had a strange feeling of being watched or observed ,i asked whos there a few times , no answer!  had same silence no birds sounds etc!  we did have a large pond 100 feet away ? our home was in the woods ,so i also didnt hear any brances or leaves cracking!  then the  feeling  lifted and all was normal ,time was not a factor!  i had no time reference , felt like oh! 5 minutes? or so! .  there was no object , just that same feeling and same silence . the difference though was i felt observed and watched ,also heard voices. i had no feeling of fear.
content.summary: Was 12 total silence dog saw ran mother saw shifted 3 times dissapeared jets tracked stewart af base had recurances same silence voices strange feeling bieng observed 20 yrs later

content.detailedDescription:
Was outside waiting for the ice cream man to get my baseball and kiss cards/gum, my dad said look at that thing. it seemed like all the neighbors and my mom came outside,i remember the whole block outside looking up. it was moving very slow, no one ran to call the police, just watched.It looked at least 1200-1600 ft long x 250 ft wide,rectangular but very jagged edges and at least 400 small white lights like in your ceiling.I don't recall any sound but just moved so slow.But it was a long time ago but when i ask my parents about it they and the neighbors don't recall.. a dream? it seemed real especially everyone looking up like they couldn't look away.
thanks
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: Was 8 years old it was dusk all the neighbors were outside seeing it for some reason but no one ever spoke of it again? i was just waiting for the ice cream man truck

content.detailedDescription:
I was at work, and i saw what at first i thought to be an aircraft n of my location. however, it rapidly climbed, turned, changed direction very sharply and made other maneuvers i have not seen an aircraft do.

the craft appeared to be behind overlook ridge, as seen from the east side of the willamette river and the swan island industrial park. 

the craft was spherical to oval-shaped, and was constantly changing color. red, white, green, blue and violet were all seen in different, non-repeating patterns.

my first reaction was skepticism, then i decided to use my smartphone and see if i could capture video of the item. i made one short video, and a second longer video when the object appeared a second time.

i was still skeptical, thinking it may be a drone fitted with lights. 

i lost sight of the object in the treeline in video one. the lights simply go out in video 2.

item was briefly seen again at 11 pm pst, but just a quick glimpse before it was once again lost in the treeline, i was unable to catch it on camera this time.
content.summary: Blinking, swirling clister of lights making extreme maneuvers near ridge,

content.altitude: Treetop, 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Castle air force base near merced, ca had just been closed down due to budget cuts.  the base was mostly empty but for a skeleton squadron and had very few planes on the tarmac.

a few friends and myself were parked at a favorite spot at the south end of the runway on a public rural road.  it was next to a runway light bar and right under the path of jets landing and taking off.

it's a great place to star gaze and on this night it was still warm and clear and there were no planes to bother us; or so we thought.

we were sitting/laying on the hoods of our cars when something big, black and completely silent passed over our heads and not until it had passed did we hear any engine noise.  there had been rumors, but one was actually flying over our heads!  a stealth bomber was using the runway for touch and go!

startled us good; we weren't expecting anything to be using the runway since the base was closed and that jet was quiet; we didn't hear or see it until it was on top of us.

it wasn't apparent at first; but we waited for the jet to come back around since we could now see it blot out the stars when it went past us to the west.

and surprisingly; there was a blue orb or light playing "tag" with the jet.  this orb was following it; it would slow down then catch up and almost tag the tail of the jet, only to fall back and then do it again.  that orb was zipping all over the place.

there had to be somebody in the tower watching airspace around this mostly invisible jet; how they could have failed to see the orb was not possible.  the orb looked to be maybe a fourth the size of the jet's tail and a bright, soft, sky blue color.

and even stranger; it seemed like the pilot was just ignoring the orb.  after perhaps half a dozen passes over the runway the stealth never came back and the light disappeared with it.

even stranger yet; while waiting for the jet to return we were scanning the skies, and i was using my binoculars which i always carried in my car.

i was looking almost straight up; and i see something that i have never spoken about to anyone.

i saw blue orbs shooting beams of white light at green orbs which were shooting beams of red light back at them.  there were dozens of them just outside our atmosphere fighting with light.  i saw more than one of those orbs pull a "star trek" move; as though it moved at warp speed leaving a colored light trail behind it before it disappeared and then reappeared elsewhere with that same light trail. 

even now it doesn't seem real.  but i know what i saw that night.

and it gets even weirder.

those same friends and i met at the local live band bar about a week later.    we were sitting there talking about the jet and lights we had seen when this airman in uniform (a military police uniform but with a black beret) sits himself down at our table and interrupts our conversation.  he looks at each one of us and then quietly informed us that it would be to our best interest to never mention what we saw to anyone again.

the jet didn't scare me, the colored orbs playing space invaders didn't scare me but something in that man's voice did.  and i got the impression that he wasn't talking about the stealth.

so i haven't; until now.

unfortunately there is no physical evidence to back this up.  only my memory of something i'll never forget.
content.summary: Bright lights playing

content.detailedDescription: Photographing thunderbird air show. it wasn't until examining the photos that we noticed the unusual object that appears to be playing with the jet.
content.summary: Not visible by eye only in photograph afterwards. would suspect camera or reflection except for one frame that seems to reflect on clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I was stopped in my car and facing due east at an extended red light at the intersection of honore and palmer ranch parkway, when i noticed a silver object in the sky; it appeared a few degrees above the traffic light.  at first i thought it was a plane about 3-5 miles out and on final approach, heading to the srq airport.  however, the object did not turn northerly towards srq, but instead, seemed to come slightly toward me (i.E. heading due west, as i was facing due east).  then i realized that if it were a plane i would not see so much silver "glowing", as it was a very bright silver, almost glowing light,  in clear weather with a bright blue sky. also,  only if an airplane is perpendicular does one see the silver body. 

i continued to watch the silver object hover in the sky for about 1+ minute, until the object vanished.  literally, it was gone.  i asked my husband who was a passenger beside me if he had seen it and unfortunately he had not.
content.summary: Stationary, hovering silver object in clear, late afternoon sky

content.detailedDescription: I was watching an airplane fly overhead when a light that was coming towards it perpendicular to it suddenly turned more than 90 degrees to follow the plane and i lost sight over my house. then another plane came from the same direction with a similar light following it which i also lost over the house. as i was standing there 5 jets came over the tree line flying in different directions. 3 went off in the direction of the planes and 2 flew in off and i lost them over the trees.
content.summary: I saw two ufos follow two airplanes then 5 military jets came as if investigating

content.detailedDescription: San luis valley - colorado. went camping last weekend. viewing pics and saw this weird green orb in the sky. idk what to make of it...
content.summary: San luis valley - colorado. went camping last weekend. viewing pics and saw this weird green orb in the sky. idk what to make of it.

content.detailedDescription: I was walking my dog at 1:25 am on friday , may 8th and i believe that i witnessed a ufo in flight . when i looked up in the air i thought it was just a star at first but it started to flash green , it kind of glimmered as a light when it hits a diamond . at that point started paying attention to it because i thought that it might be an jet having trouble with an engine or something , but it was making no noise . then it looked to make a flying maneuver to the se , but now i think of it , it could have been gaining altitude . that only took about 2 seconds , then it took off to the ne faster then anything that i have ever seen before in my life . my brain was telling me that maybe it was a shooting star ? but i have seen shooting stars before and it really didn't resemble that , plus i have never seen a shooting star change directions . and i didn't see a tail on it like you would from a comet . when you see something like this for the first time in person , you start to second guess yourself . i wish i would have taken my cell phone out and filmed it , but once it started moving it only lasted a few seconds . not 100% sure that what i saw was a ufo this early morning , but after going through every other option and trying to think everything through , i am now 75% sure that it couldn't have been anything else .
content.summary: Was walking my dog at 1:25 am and i believe i witnessed a ufo .

content.detailedDescription: I was on a cruise ship with family at the back of the ship on top of deck there were people below and my aunt was with me it was our last day at sea we were heading back to miami fl from bahamas. it was pitch black looking out out of no where this ball of light shoots out the water it was pretty far out at first we thought it was a flare signal  then the ball just shot right then left then down and stright up and just disappeared everybody who was down below and above just started asking each other did you see that omg did you see that i looked at my aunt and said that was no flare gun she's said that was really weird i said i think we just saw a ufo she said we probably did.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Round in shape. glowing redish orange.

content.detailedDescription: I was traveling south on ravenna road in the evening around dusk when i came upon an area in which there were 6 or 7 red orange globes in the sky in a line directly above the road moving north.  i travel this road daily and have never seen anything like this.  the globes moved silently through the air in a direct line not as high as a helicopter or normal flying planes - much lower.  the cars in front of me pulled over to the side of the road and i assumed they were perplexed by what they were seeing....I slowed down to continue to observe and try to understand.  the objects continued moving north and i continues moving south.  i never stopped but as i proceeded home i called my boyfriend within 1 min to say i thought i saw a ufo.  i proceeded home which took about 10 min.  i called twinsburg police non emergency when home because i was so disturbed....I just asked if  others reported anything similar and said i saw lights on ravenna road/....  embarrassed i ended the call and said i have never reported anything like this before and felt silly but it was so disturbing i had to do something   no incidents since but saw online that others in this area have witnessed same objects.  there is a military site close by so i keep telling myself it was them
content.summary: I was traveling south on ravenna road.   i saw 6-7 low flying globes which appeared red with and orange glow hovering directly over the road

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: I was standing at my front window. i observed 2 orange objects coming into my line of sight. i called my wife who also observed them. then i went out on the front landing a witnessed direction of flight. went to side door observed the departure.Approx. 2 minutes later i saw two more orange objects approx 10 miles behind the first two i called my wife again, and she witnessed them also. much the same trajectory, two orange objects approx. 1 mile apart. the last one appeared to reduce to an orange pinprick, as if turning slightly, then i waited and went back to the front window.I saw a larger solid red color object , in a lower attitude, and much larger, but red almost dull red, i called my wife again she observed it also, and it seemed to drop down,as if observing or landing, as it did so it sped up and  turned orange, then back to red and was lost in the distance.There were patchy clouds in the distance.I went back to the my observation points, but never saw anything else. if it was a ufo it was 15 to 20 times the size of the first 4 objects.This took place between 21;25 and 21:35 hrs the time is approx..The color was unusual, and two travelling together was odd.Airliners do not travel this route.My wife was  excited and called her son to tell him. i felt i should report this and mufon came to mind.
content.summary: 5 ufos observed, 2 orange 1 mile apart, 2min later 2 more orange, then red which went down in distance

content.detailedDescription: (1) 7 may 2015: at 22:06 pm est my husband, dog & i were inside our house. i was using my computer.. which kept changing websites on it's own.. the computer would "bounce" from documents to websites. what is unusual: i was reading websites on ufo's at the time & about morgan freeman's new tv show. wow! (2)i heard a loud-thunder-roar. my dog barked, and ran to the door jumping and kicking the door to get out. (unusual for him. he never kicks the door or jumps at the door.) my dog & i went outside. (3)i expected to see a low-flying helicopter (by the sound & how close the object was to the ground) it was.. maybe the height of our barn (it was not a helicopter). (4) we saw a big object in the sky in the shape of a "v" with white pulsating lights. it shot straight-up in the air. then it changed shape from a "v" & became a straight line.. the lights stopped pulsating & remained steady & the noise stopped. it hovered for a while and moved ne to nw and it hovered many times. i ran into my house to get my binoculars. when i looked at it through the binoculars it appeared to have many square windows with white lights.. all in a straight line. i ran back into my house to wake up my husband, he would not wake up.. he yelled at me, "go away". the dog kept barking. again, i looked through my binoculars.. to look at object. the object moved very fast to the nw then back ne to nw to ne to nw to ne several times (too fast & too irrational for an airplane or helicopter). it all of a sudden, it flew straight up.. then it came back down.. and went back up again.. then it "shot" to the ne and (6)"poof" it vanished. (5)i was upset i didn't take a photo. i was excited to see it and i knew that my dog saw it. my dog just kept jumping up and down barking at the object. i was upset that i wasted time trying to wake up my husband. i should  have tried to take a photo... but, i just kept watching it.. to see what it would do next. this lasted about 10 minutes. it could not have been a jet airplane, it could not have been a small aircraft. i know it was not a helicopter. i don't know what it was.. it was a ufo: unidentified flying object to me. (it was just like the ufo i saw on 7-6-77 and i reported 7-7-77). today: 5/8/2015: from 18:30 to 20:45 est.. my dog keeps barking at me and behaving like he did on 5-7-15.. he wants to go outside, but if he goes outside.. all he does is bark ne. my dog & i keep going outside & looking up.. but i haven't seen any more ufo's tonight. i'll wait for darkness. i have a problem with your form. do you want the "size" it was for "real" or what my eyes saw?(close-up or at a distance?). i don't want this ufo information on tv broadcast or newspapers without first writing or calling or contacting me. my computer has been "messed up" since "just before" i saw the ufo on 5-7-2015
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: @ 22:06 pm est my dog & i heard a loud thunder roar. we watched it for 10 minutes until it

content.detailedDescription:
On may 6, 2015 as i was on my way to work i notice that we had a beautiful sky with and incredible cloud formation and a bright sun rising from the east.  so i took my iphone 6 and took a photo of this beautiful day.  when i open the photo on my phone immediately i notice towards the right side of the photo above the electrical pole a green neon object.  i look at the clouds again and i was able to see a very small green section not cover yet by the clouds and eventually it was completely cover by the clouds and disappear, never to be seen again. unfortunately i was so in shock and mesmerize by it that forgot to take more photos.

i have never believe on this thing of ufo, but i can not find any logical explanation for this object. i have show this photos to several of my friends and they are all in shock the moment they see it and immediately they say "wow you got a ufo".  i don't know about that, but at this moment i do not have any other logical or natural explanation for it. 

could you please analyze this photo and let me know if this is a natural phenomenon or if in reality is a ufo?

thanks..!!!
content.summary: A massive green neon object in between the clouds

content.detailedDescription:
1. on balcony with partner smoking a cigarette. location is outwith light pollution from city and generally has a good view of the stars.
2. as the area is generally dark, the stars are usually bright and visible in the sky. we both noticed what initially looked like two stars become significantly brighter in the sky. they were not moving and they became so bright that they were impossible to miss.
3. i initially thought they were stars until they became brighter. we can often see satellites clearly in the night sky here however both these objects were at first stationary and at least several times larger than an ordinary satellite. perhaps 3-4 times larger than what we usually observe.
4. both objects were initally believed to be stars and became notably brighter. they were side by side about two finger widths apart on an extended arm. they were not moving. we observed this for around a minute or so. both objects then began to make their way south and faded away into the night sky.
5. my partner and i both thought that perhaps these objects were stars that had perhaps reached the end of their life cycle due to how bright they became. we can regularly see venus clear and bright in the sky and these objects were much brighter in comparison. i then thought they might be satellites however they were not moving at all. when they began to move i was unable to explain what it was we had witnessed or what these objects could be. there were no aircraft present at this time. the balcony was in darkness, the sky was clear with stars present. 
6. the objects both faded away entirely. it took about 30 seconds for them to completely fade.
content.summary: Observed two bright objects. thought to be stars. began to glow brightly. both objects moved south together and faded away.

content.detailedDescription: Back in 1972 we were coming from a high school outing with some friends. we were in the back of a truck, when one of my friend's saw an airplane above us. i looked and noticed it had no wing's and was very shiny! i told him "dude that's no plane it has no wing's" as i was telling my friend and pointing upwards it shot straight down in a v shape no sound what so ever! it's not shiny anymore since all we see is the underneath. shot straight back up to the heavens! we just looked at each other speechless! never mentioned it because i figured people would just laugh or jump to negative conclusions!Don't know or remember if the driver and other passengers in the cab of the truck saw it. me and my two friend's in the back of the truck sure did!
content.summary: Me & two friends were traveling in back of a pick-up coming from a high school outing.One friend yelled out look at that plane! i noticed it couldn't be no wing's.I pointed up n it shot straight down n back up like a v, undercarriage dull disappears

content.detailedDescription: I took a series of three pictures. i didn't see the lights until looking at the pics when i got home. i discovered that the first pic i took had the lights, the second pic i tried zooming in on the city had lights. then the third pic had no lights. all pics were taken back to back within the minute.
content.summary: Hovering above downtown

content.detailedDescription:
Estimados, les transcribo el mail que le escribí hace unos días a la organización cridovni y que aún no tuve ningún tipo de respuesta.

estimados, les escribo un breve texto donde espero poder detallar con claridad lo que pudimos apreciar mi esposa y yo hace un par de horas.
el único fin por supuesto es colaborar y si es posible develar lo que vimos.

lunes 23 de febrero, zona punta gorda, hora 22, desde un segundo piso en un balcón que da hacia la playa la mulata, vimos un objeto similar a un avión con trayectoria de sur a este con luces intermitentes blancas muy claras. su intermitencia variaba cada 3 segundos de quedar en negro total a destellar en un color blanco fuerte.

no volaba a una altura en la cual estamos acostumbrados a ver diariamente los aviones comerciales pasar y lo que más nos llamo la atención fue que comenzó a cambiar su rumbo de izquierda a derecha. en ningún momento escuchamos sonido alguno de motores o turbinas.

en uno de los giros pudimos apreciar las luces blancas más intensas y que parecían provenir desde alas de un avión, pero no vimos ninguna luz central, solo a los lados de las supuestas alas (que no vimos)

su andar no era brusco, llevaba ritmo, pero se movía a una velocidad mayor a un avión ya que la altura en la cual volaba era mucho más alta de la que vuelan los aviones.

no vimos otros colores en el destello de luces, solamente las blancas fuertes, lo cual nos llamó la atención porque por lo general los aviones tienen luces rojas además de las blancas.

el objeto estuvo delante nuestro por 3 minutos dando giros y luego se alejó hacia el sur donde lo vimos que también siguió haciendo los mismos giros hasta que lo perdimos de vista ya que tomo la dirección norte.

lamentablemente no tuvimos oportunidad de registrarlo.

esperamos que nuestra declaración pueda aportar esperando que sume a algún otro avistamiento.

quedo a las ordenes por cualquier duda 

saludos coordiales
content.summary: Vimos un objeto similar a un avión con trayectoria de sur a este con luces intermitentes blancas muy claras

content.detailedDescription:
Filmed using a panasonic w-850 camcorder. 

i was indoors at 9:45 pm  when i felt the need to get up and go outside. (i don't know why though) - i saw flashing lights in the distance and i thought it was a plane at first, yet i continued to film it. 

there was a plane in the area at the time of the sighting and filming. i ignored the plane and concentrated on the strange flashing object. 

the ufo appeared head on, then disappeared and reappeared across the sky! i didn't even see it move! it just reappeared. like it teleported! 

this went on for some time, and i caught on camera the ufo morphing into a triangle with white bright stationary lights on the top of the pyramid, and down at the bottom (left and right) these never flashed, but in the middle of the triangle, i saw red, white, blue flashing lights. 

the triangle ufo morphed in front of my eyes! disappearing and reappearing across the night sky. 

the ufo just disappeared in the end. blinked out. i was shocked because earlier that day i was outside looking for ufos using my infrared and filters on my camcorder. i was even mentally thinking "come on , i know you are up there, show yourself"! 


one hour later, i filmed (but didn't see) a military helicopter scouting the area. the vibration of the helicopter was loud. i knew (from studying and filming helicopters for a while now, that it was not a civilian helicopter) 


i will note, in the video you can hear my daughter coughing , she has a slight tic due to anxiety which causes her to cough or clear her throat. this was not an affect of the ufo in any way .
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Triangle morphing ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Having five days off of work i decided to go to sturgis sd.Just to say i had been 
there.Leaving k.C.Early i arrived at sturgis in the afternoon the only place i could find to park was in a residential area that had no overnight parking you had to move your car by 9:30 pm.After checking out the sites in town it was getting late and i had to move my car i decided to go to a rest area on i 90 to spend the night.After leaving going west i noticed a bright light to my left going the same speed i was 80mph i thought it was strange
that i couldn't get past it after quite a
few miles i remember that i thought about stopping and going across the two highways to see what it was.The next thing i remember is coming up to the rest area i pulled in and found a space to park and got ready to sleep i looked at my watch and saw it was 2:30 am and wondered where the time had gone.I slept until morning and went back to sturgis ate bought some stuff to take back home and left early in the afternoon to go back home.Here is the strange part this happened in 2002 and i didn't remember it until 2014.I have checked the distance to rest area it's 21 miles and it took me 4 1/2 hours to get there at 80mph.Have you ever heard of anyone forgetting about something this strange for such a long time.
content.summary: Going west on i 90 i saw a light pacing me going 80mph when i stopped i had lost 4 1/2 hours

content.detailedDescription: There were several sightings over a few days in two boroughs of new york city. my wife and i saw a huge glowing light that dropped behind the skyline of manhattan one night. it was over sized, as i am used to seeing regular lights all the time because of the nearby airports.  my mother in law was able to snap this picture as my father in law was driving along the hudson river the following night. there are two in this photo.
content.summary: Two lights over the hudson river.

content.detailedDescription: I seen a bright light in the sky bigger than a star.It looked like it was moving so i told my friends too look and it started to look like it was lowering from a distance. everybody kind of let it go for a few seconds then we looked back up and it was gone ,we were all shocked because we were looking in the sky for it and it appeared high in the sky over our heads. when we all start saying look it shot off so fast that it u can feel a sensation .It scard us so much that we ran in the house . you dont ever see things like this in san francisco. i am a tru believer after that. it wasnt a shooting star because it was too big and hoovered 1st and then you can literally feel presure when it took off but couldnt hear anything. i know its kind of late to report it but it sticks in the back of my mind to much
content.summary: It was hoovering in the sky for about 10mins. i took my eyes off for 5 seconds then looked up and it was over my head and shot off faster then anything i ever seen

content.detailedDescription: We were visiting friends, and went to mackerricher state beach in fort bragg ca. we went to see the whales that are in that area that time of year.We saw a few. i took lots of pics. when we got home i started looking through the pics, and saw the pic i took at 3:05:33 pm, i noticed the pink thing. i did not witness anything at the time. i showed my husband, he said it was probably a water spot or something. i thought it was strange, so i went through the other photos i took that day,  in the photo i took at 3:04:33, you can see a white dot in the clouds. the next photo is at 3:05:30, there is no white dot. the photo taken at 3:05:33 shows the dot with a pink hew farther up in the sky. the next photo was at 3:05:56, you can see pink hew in water. not sure whats it was, i took the photos from a cell phone. have not had another photos with spots or problems. i feel like i crazy when i show people, but its really strange. would like feed back on your opinion on what i am seeing in the photos. please email me with response. thanks, amy
content.summary: Did not witness, going through photos, noticed a white dot in horizon, then saw the pic about one min later, the white dot was higher in the sky with a pink hew around it

content.detailedDescription: May 2nd 2015 about 8:20pm heading south on kalamath st to 6th ave we observed about 6 to 10 lights that at first appeared to be planes of helicopters from a distance but were very bright. the more south we drove the brighter they became, as they traveled north in no specific formation they stopped and made a formation that im my opinion resembles some sort of constelation. possibly the big dipper or some other. they stayed in formation for about a minute or two then one by one would start fading and disapeared. the formation almost felt like a message saying "look here". very cool and scary and the same time.
content.summary: Sighting in denver

content.detailedDescription: Last evening was a perfect night for stargazing.  dark, cloudless and bright stars.  i was on our back deck shortly after 9 pm. at about 9:15pm i spotted a typical satellite or pin dot of light moving south to north and just below (east of) the big dipper.  as i watched it pass directly overhead the object made a smooth, but tight turn to the northeast.  the turn appeared to be between 40 and 45 degrees which would also be the new heading.  the turn was made as the object was nearest alioth on the dipper's handle.  after the turn i checked the time.  it was 9:16 pm.  the light continued in a northeast direction until it faded from view about 30 seconds after the turn.  the object looked and acted like the typical satellites that pass over us on any given night.  almost all follow the same south to north trajectory and appear as smooth moving pin dots of reflective light in the night sky that fade into and out of view.  as soon as the object made it's turn, i looked at it through binoculars and noticed nothing different.  no other colors or blinking.  it remained a steady moving pin dot of light until it faded from view.  my feelings were rationally curious as soon as i witnessed the turn which prompted me to pick up the binoculars and write down a note or two.  prior to that it was just a beautiful night sky to gaze at.
content.summary: While stargazing watched what appeared to be typical satellite make a 45 degree turn

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were on our way to the local laundromat in downtown irwin, when we noticed a very large red ball in the sky--it was pretty big, my boyfriend and i both thought it might be a meteor at first, and were a little frightened. it was bright red and the surface moved like fire, almost like a giant twinkling star. i kept asking him to pull off to the side of the rode to get a better look, but he decided to just wait until we got to the laundromat. the light seemed to hover in the same spot as we drove, but i suppose it could have been moving very slowly. when we finally got to our destination (just a few minutes away from when we first saw the object) we both got out of our car to get a better look. a woman and her grandchild were also on their porch watching this, as were a small group of teens on the sidewalk. i over heard the woman telling her child that there was another light behind the first one, but i could not see it from my position. my boyfriend also told me he saw two large lights independent of each other in the sky, but i personally only saw one. in just a matter of minutes of getting out of the car, the light seemed to change it's speed and move northeast rather quickly. it didn't 'zoom' away, just sort of looked like it had somewhere to be all of a sudden. it then disappeared behind clouds. i couldn't help but notice that there were a lot of planes in the sky during and after the light--i definitely felt like more that usual. this was not just an isolated sighting by my family only, there were various people who also witnessed this, and i am really surprised that nothing was on the news, or no reports have been made. i have been trying to figure out what these lights could have been since last night, and there is literally zero information.
content.summary: Two large fire-like balls in the sky moved slow enough for many people to observe, then sped up and left.
